definition_statement: This place covers: Non-torque transmitting connections of rods or tubular parts to flat surfaces at an angle, i.e. the rods or tubular parts are non-parallel with respect to the flat surfaces. The rods or tubular parts can be connected perpendicularly to the flat surfaces. The connections can involve an intermediate member. The rods or tubular parts and the flat surfaces are constructional elements or machine parts. The rods or tubular parts are elongated elements, of any cross-section, that do not convey fluids. Rods or tubular elements may be flexible, but not flaccid, e.g. a cord is not a rod or tubular element in the sense of  . Flat surfaces are surfaces that are planar at least locally around the connection location.
